member.summary: Wraps plain script code into a full compilable unit for the specified language, including using/imports, namespace, and class wrapper.

Additional global code to append after the class.

member.summary: Extracts raw script from a wrapped unit, returning the inner class body and separating namespace, directives, and global code.
member.param: Outputs remaining code outside the class (if any).
The class name used to detect the wrapper.
member.returns: The unwrapped inner script body.
